description.en-US:
Tap into the world's most advanced legal research system on-the-go. Access familiar WestlawNext features including, WestSearch™, KeyCite™, Folders, History, document notes and highlighting, browse database content and more. WestlawNext account required. GO MOBILE WITH YOUR RESEARCH Be ready in an instant with WestlawNext Mobile. Doing research on your subway commute? Working at an off-site client meeting? Gain the competitive edge you need when you access the world's most comprehensive collection of legal content on your smartphone or tablet. SYNCHRONIZED The WestlawNext mobile site synchronizes across all of your devices while providing comprehensive features and content, so your research is always up to date. HOMEPAGE Access previous research or begin something new. It's easy to find and read documents, arrange research, and more. You can easily: Browse Content, KeyCite a Document, and access Folders, Recent Documents, and Recent Searches. SEARCH Search for documents using WestSearch, the world's most advanced legal search engine. It incorporates 125 years of West's proprietary analysis of the law to deliver the best results faster. ICONS Eyeglasses, notes, and folder icons help you to see which documents you've already worked with and which are new to your research. You can even filter your results based on these actions. These icons help you know when your research is complete.
  • Notes: Document has notes
  • Eyeglasses: Document has been viewed in the past 30 days for the same client ID
  • Folder: Document resides in a folder
FOLDERS Easily organize your research on the fly. Access your folders at anytime from the home page by clicking on your project folder. View documents in your folders, add new documents to folder, and create new folders. KEYCITE Check the status of the law using KeyCite from your mobile device. NOTES You can add notes to documents as you research. Just click on the Tools button and select Add Note. EMAIL DOCUMENTS When you find a document you'd like to deliver, simply email the document from the Tools menu. RECENT DOCUMENTS AND SEARCHES Research syncs across devices, so it's easy to view recent searches and documents.
